players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly active. We should look for who seems most relieved or is trying to steer suspicion away."
Bob: "I am the detective and investigated Diana, who is confirmed to be the mafioso. Keep an eye on her activities."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana first instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
Diana: "Bob, if you're really the detective, why did you wait until now to reveal your investigation? That seems like a desperate mafia move to frame me."
You: "Diana, if Bob is mafia, why would he frame you when he could have framed me or stayed hidden? His claim is risky if false."
Bob: "I am the detective and have evidence that Diana is the mafioso. I will present my findings in the next round. Until then, stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly active. We should look for who seems most relieved or is trying to steer suspicion away."
You: "I am the detective and investigated Diana, who is confirmed to be the mafioso. Keep an eye on her activities."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana first instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
Diana: "Bob, if you're really the detective, why did you wait until now to reveal your investigation? That seems like a desperate mafia move to frame me."
Alice: "Diana, if Bob is mafia, why would he frame you when he could have framed me or stayed hidden? His claim is risky if false."
You: "I am the detective and have evidence that Diana is the mafioso. I will present my findings in the next round. Until then, stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
